ComicInfo.Title: O, Brothers, Where Art Thou?
ComicInfo.Summary:
In an effort to the defeat the alien Kibrani, Andrew and his ragtag team continue their quest to assemble an army of Jinn (Genies). Imprisoned for centuries in China, two powerful Jinn may hold the key, but can they be released? Meanwhile, Kibrani Warrior Lahasad Brim will face his greatest test, and a team member's dark secret is revealed!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Andrew Huerta | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Carlos Gomez | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 14:07:34. [CVDB433869]
ComicInfo.Characters: Andrew Marcus, Haya, Kibrani, Lahasad Brim
